Name: Desolation
About the game: Embark on a journey through an abandoned city in Desolation, a multiplayer horror game set in a post-apocalyptic world. Team up with other players to escape the dangers that lurk in the shadows and find safety. Experience the ultimate blend of horror, exploration, and suspense, creating a fully immersive and terrifying environment. The abandoned city once thrived but has since been deserted due to a mysterious disaster. Start in a seemingly secure location, but soon discover the city is far from safe. Explore the city filled with shadows and eerie noises while facing off against unknown dangers. Features Desolation's unique multiplayer mechanics require players to coordinate and rely on each other for survival. Work together to achieve your goals and escape the city. With 1-6 player online co op , Desolation can be played with or without friends. Stunning graphics and attention to detail in the abandoned city create a sense of immersion. The sounds you hear echo around the whole city. Desolation is a nerve-wracking experience, designed to keep players on the edge of their seats with a thrilling storyline. Brave the horrors alone or with friends and experience an unforgettable first person horror adventure.
